Journal and Conference Papers

  • Hanny, D., Schmidt, S., & Resch, B. (2024). Active Learning for Identifying Disaster-Related Tweets: A Comparison with Keyword Filtering and Generic Fine-Tuning. Accepted for the Intelligent Systems Conference 2024

Theses
